caption: Audit Activity
description: The Audit Activity event is a generic event that defines a set of attributes available in the Audit Activity events. As a generic event, it could be used to log events that are not otherwise defined by the Audit Activity category.
name: audit_base

http_request.description: Details about the underlying HTTP request.

http_response.description: Details about the underlying HTTP response.

src_endpoint.description: Details about the source of the IAM activity.
